mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.readcount, COUNT(b.content_id) AS review_count, AVG(b.score) AS avg_score FROM contents c LEFT JOIN board b ON c.id = b.content_id AND b.big_code = 2 AND b.small_code = 6 WHERE c.big_code = #{big_code} GROUP BY c.id, c.big_code, c.readcount ORDER BY c.readcount DESC, review_count DESC, avg_score DESC
SELECT * FROM board WHERE user_id = #{user_id} AND small_code = 6
SELECT * FROM board b, contents c WHERE b.small_code = 6 AND b.content_id = c.id AND c.big_code = #{big_code}
